original_title: The Elf and the Magic Key
overview: On a snowy Christmas Eve, Santa Claus is kidnapped and held for ransom. A young elf goes on a mission to find a magic key that will help her free Santa Claus. Sequel to the special "The Elf Who Saved Christmas."
tagline: A Magic Key is the Only Way to Save Santa from Kidnappers!
title: The Elf and the Magic Key
